entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
